body.p:
448
March 15th 5
Thomas P. Hays
Blandsville, Ky
Sir
Yours of the to the Governor has been referred to this office for answer
It is not deemed advisable at present to increase the number of State troops already in the field
Your request to be commissioned Captain to raise troops cannot therefore be granted.

Very Respectfully
D. W. Lindsey
Adjutant General of Ky
